response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering is valued at $15,000 to us due to its exceptional quality and rare features. Given its worth to us, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving of $3,000 compared to our standard pricing. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
